underlying_goal: Design and plan the implementation of a marketing consent (광고 수신 동의) feature for user registration in a Spring Boot project, as a prototype for the ktown4u system
friction_detail: Claude initially explored the wrong project (Tmux-Orchestrator) and tried to find an existing 'pil' directory before user clarified it needed to be created from scratch.
brief_summary: User wanted to brainstorm and plan a marketing consent feature for registration; Claude guided a structured Q&A design session and produced a design doc and implementation plan, but actual coding was not yet started.
